<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_cs_auto_resolution_simulation_configuration</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_cs_auto_resolution_simulation_configuration">scheduled_jobISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="scheduled_job" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Delete scheduled job after delete</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
global.AutoResolutionSimulationHelper.deleteScheduledJob(current.getValue('scheduled_job'));
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-03-31 19:31:37</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>13b1d667ebf92110d8652add08522886</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete scheduled job after delete</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Issue Auto-Resolution" source="com.glide.cs.auto_resolution">81ddf4a03c75311068bcf327dfe37fa6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_13b1d667ebf92110d8652add08522886</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-04-03 18:10:39</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=13b1d667ebf92110d8652add08522886"/> </record_update>
